verses.verse: Now the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Tell<WH1696> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> to turn<WH7725> back<WH7725> and camp<WH2583> before<WH6440> Pi-hahiroth, between<WH996> Migdol<WH4024> and the sea;<WH3220> you shall camp<WH2583> in front<WH6440> of Baal-zephon, opposite<WH5227> it, by the sea.<WH3220>
"For Pharaoh<WH6547> will say<WH559> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> 'They are wandering<WH943> aimlessly<WH943> in the land;<WH776> the wilderness<WH4057> has shut<WH5462> them in.'

"Thus I will harden<WH2388> Pharaoh<WH6547>'s heart,<WH3820> and he will chase<WH7291> after<WH310> them; and I will be honored<WH3513> through Pharaoh and all<WH3605> his army,<WH2428> and the Egyptians<WH4714> will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>" And they did<WH6213> so.<WH3651>

When the king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> was told<WH5046> that the people<WH5971> had fled,<WH1272> Pharaoh<WH6547> and his servants<WH5650> had<WH2015> a change<WH2015> of heart<WH3824> toward<WH413> the people,<WH5971> and they said,<WH559> "What<WH4100> is this<WH2088> we have done,<WH6213> that we have let<WH7971> Israel<WH3478> go<WH7971> from serving<WH5647> us?"
So he made<WH631> his chariot<WH7393> ready<WH631> and took<WH3947> his people<WH5971> with him;
and he took<WH3947> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> select<WH977> chariots,<WH7393> and all<WH3605> the [other] chariots<WH7393> of Egypt<WH4714> with officers<WH7991> over<WH5921> all<WH3605> of them.

And the Lord<WH3068> hardened<WH2388> the heart<WH3820> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt,<WH4714> and he chased<WH7291> after<WH310> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> as the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were going<WH3318> out boldly.<WH7311> <WH3027>

Then the Egyptians<WH4714> chased<WH7291> after<WH310> them [with] all<WH3605> the horses<WH5483> [and] chariots<WH7393> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> his horsemen<WH6571> and his army,<WH2428> and they overtook<WH5381> them camping<WH2583> by the sea,<WH3220> beside<WH5921> Pi-hahiroth, in front<WH6440> of Baal-zephon.

And as Pharaoh<WH6547> drew<WH7126> near,<WH7126> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> looked,<WH5375> <WH5869> and behold,<WH2009> the Egyptians<WH4714> were marching<WH5265> after<WH310> them, and they became<WH3372> very<WH3966> frightened;<WH3372> so the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> cried<WH6817> out to the Lord.<WH3068>

Then they said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Is it because<WH4480> <WH1097> there<WH369> were no<WH369> graves<WH6913> in Egypt<WH4714> that you have taken<WH3947> us away to die<WH4191> in the wilderness<WH4057>? Why<WH4100> have you dealt<WH6213> with us in this<WH2088> way,<WH2088> bringing<WH3318> us out of Egypt<WH4714>?

"Is this<WH2088> not the word<WH1697> that we spoke<WH1696> to you in Egypt,<WH4714> saying,<WH559> 'Leave<WH2308> us alone<WH4480> that we may serve<WH5647> the Egyptians<WH4714>'? For it would have been better<WH2896> for us to serve<WH5647> the Egyptians<WH4714> than<WH4480> to die<WH4191> in the wilderness.<WH4057>"

But Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> "Do not fear!<WH3372> Stand<WH3320> by and see<WH7200> the salvation<WH3444> of the Lord<WH3068> which<WH834> He will accomplish<WH6213> for you today;<WH3117> for the Egyptians<WH4714> whom<WH834> you have seen<WH7200> today,<WH3117> you will never<WH3808> <WH5750> see<WH7200> them again<WH3254> forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>
"The Lord<WH3068> will fight<WH3898> for you while you keep<WH2790> silent.<WH2790>"
Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Why<WH4100> are you crying<WH6817> out to Me? Tell<WH1696> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> to go<WH5265> forward.<WH5265>

"And as for you, lift<WH7311> up your staff<WH4294> and stretch<WH5186> out your hand<WH3027> over<WH5921> the sea<WH3220> and divide<WH1234> it, and the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall go<WH935> through<WH935> the midst<WH8432> of the sea<WH3220> on dry<WH3004> land.<WH3004>

"And as for Me, behold,<WH2009> I will harden<WH2388> the hearts<WH3820> of the Egyptians<WH4714> so that they will go<WH935> in after<WH310> them; and I will be honored<WH3513> through Pharaoh<WH6547> and all<WH3605> his army,<WH2428> through his chariots<WH7393> and his horsemen.<WH6571>
"Then the Egyptians<WH4714> will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord,<WH3068> when I am honored<WH3513> through Pharaoh,<WH6547> through his chariots<WH7393> and his horsemen.<WH6571>"

And the angel<WH4397> of God,<WH430> who had been going<WH1980> before<WH6440> the camp<WH4264> of Israel,<WH3478> moved<WH5265> and went<WH1980> behind<WH4480> <WH310> them; and the pillar<WH5982> of cloud<WH6051> moved<WH5265> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> them and stood<WH5975> behind<WH4480> <WH310> them.

So it came<WH935> between<WH996> the camp<WH4264> of Egypt<WH4714> and the camp<WH4264> of Israel;<WH3478> and there was the cloud<WH6051> along with the darkness,<WH2822> yet it gave<WH215> light<WH215> at night.<WH3915> Thus the one<WH2088> did not come<WH7126> near<WH7126> the other<WH2088> all<WH3605> night.<WH3915>

Then Moses<WH4872> stretched<WH5186> out his hand<WH3027> over<WH5921> the sea;<WH3220> and the Lord<WH3068> swept<WH1980> the sea<WH3220> [back] by a strong<WH5794> east<WH6921> wind<WH7307> all<WH3605> night,<WH3915> and turned<WH7760> the sea<WH3220> into dry<WH2724> land,<WH2724> so the waters<WH4325> were divided.<WH1234>

And the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went<WH935> through<WH935> the midst<WH8432> of the sea<WH3220> on the dry<WH3004> land,<WH3004> and the waters<WH4325> [were like] a wall<WH2346> to them on their right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> and on their left.<WH8040>

Then the Egyptians<WH4714> took<WH7291> up the pursuit,<WH7291> and all<WH3605> Pharaoh's horses,<WH5483> his chariots<WH7393> and his horsemen<WH6571> went<WH935> in after<WH310> them into the midst<WH8432> of the sea.<WH3220>

And it came<WH1961> about at the morning<WH1242> watch,<WH821> that the Lord<WH3068> looked<WH8259> down<WH8259> on the army<WH4264> of the Egyptians<WH4714> through the pillar<WH5982> of fire<WH784> and cloud<WH6051> and brought<WH2000> the army<WH4264> of the Egyptians<WH4714> into confusion.<WH2000>

And He caused their chariot<WH4818> wheels<WH212> to swerve,<WH5493> and He made them drive<WH5090> with difficulty;<WH3517> so the Egyptians<WH4714> said,<WH559> "Let us flee<WH5127> from Israel,<WH3478> for the Lord<WH3068> is fighting<WH3898> for them against the Egyptians.<WH4714>"

Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Stretch<WH5186> out your hand<WH3027> over<WH5921> the sea<WH3220> so that the waters<WH4325> may come<WH7725> back<WH7725> over<WH5921> the Egyptians,<WH4714> over<WH5921> their chariots<WH7393> and their horsemen.<WH6571>"

So Moses<WH4872> stretched<WH5186> out his hand<WH3027> over<WH5921> the sea,<WH3220> and the sea<WH3220> returned<WH7725> to its normal<WH386> state<WH386> at daybreak,<WH1242> while the Egyptians<WH4714> were fleeing<WH5127> right<WH7122> into it; then the Lord<WH3068> overthrew<WH5287> the Egyptians<WH4714> in the midst<WH8432> of the sea.<WH3220>

And the waters<WH4325> returned<WH7725> and covered<WH3680> the chariots<WH7393> and the horsemen,<WH6571> even Pharaoh's entire<WH3605> army<WH2428> that had gone<WH935> into the sea<WH3220> after<WH310> them; not even<WH5704> one<WH259> of them remained.<WH7604>

But the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> walked<WH1980> on dry<WH3004> land<WH3004> through the midst<WH8432> of the sea,<WH3220> and the waters<WH4325> [were like] a wall<WH2346> to them on their right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> and on their left.<WH8040>

Thus the Lord<WH3068> saved<WH3467> Israel<WH3478> that day<WH3117> from the hand<WH3027> of the Egyptians,<WH4714> and Israel<WH3478> saw<WH7200> the Egyptians<WH4714> dead<WH4191> on the seashore.<WH3220> <WH8193>

And when Israel<WH3478> saw<WH7200> the great<WH1419> power<WH3027> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> had used<WH6213> against the Egyptians,<WH4714> the people<WH5971> feared<WH3372> the Lord,<WH3068> and they believed<WH539> in the Lord<WH3068> and in His servant<WH5650> Moses.<WH4872>
